name: Glowing Sokoban
description: A fascinating arcade puzzle game, performed in a style close to neon. You need to place all the blue rings on the red squares at the least number of moves.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows 7 Процессор: Processor 1.6 Ghz or better Оперативная память: 1024 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Graphical Card with 256 megabytes of video memory and support of DirectX 9.0. Место на диске: 100 MB Звуковая карта: Integrated Audio
